    // @ts-ignore

    3. yAxis: yì¶•ì— ëŒ€í•œ ë°ì´í„° ì…ë ¥ (ê°¯ìˆ˜)

import { useLayoutEffect } from "react";
import * as am4core from "@amcharts/amcharts4/core";
import am4themes_animated from "@amcharts/amcharts4/themes/animated";

import * as am5 from "@amcharts/amcharts5";
import * as am5xy from "@amcharts/amcharts5/xy";

am4core.useTheme(am4themes_animated);

const Chart = () => {
    useLayoutEffect(() => {
        let root = am5.Root.new("chartdiv");
        const chart = root.container.children.push(
            am5xy.XYChart.new(root, {
                wheelY: "zoomX"
            })
        );

        // ë°ì´í„° ì…‹íŒ…
        const data = [{
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 1).getTime(),
            value: 100,
            value2: 220
        }, {
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 2).getTime(),
            value: 320,
            value2: 300
        }, {
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 3).getTime(),
            value: 216,
            value2: 120
        }, {
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 4).getTime(),
            value: 150,
            value2: 190
        }, {
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 5).getTime(),
            value: 156,
            value2: 190
        }, {
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 6).getTime(),
            value: 199,
            value2: 120
        }, {
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 7).getTime(),
            value: 114,
            value2: 300
        }, {
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 8).getTime(),
            value: 269,
            value2: 290
        }, {
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 9).getTime(),
            value: 190,
            value2: 290
        }, {
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 10).getTime(),
            value: 380,
            value2: 170
        }, {
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 11).getTime(),
            value: 250,
            value2: 200
        }, {
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 12).getTime(),
            value: 110,
            value2: 210
        }, {
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 13).getTime(),
            value: 185,
            value2: 85
        }, {
            date: new Date(2021, 0, 14).getTime(),
            value: 105,
            value2: 244
        }];

        // Create Y-axis
        let yAxis = chart.yAxes.push(
            am5xy.ValueAxis.new(root, {
                extraTooltipPrecision: 1,
                renderer: am5xy.AxisRendererY.new(root, {
                    minGridDistance: 30
                })
            })
        );

        // Create X-Axis
        let xAxis = chart.xAxes.push(
            am5xy.DateAxis.new(root, {
                baseInterval: { timeUnit: "day", count: 1 },
                renderer: am5xy.AxisRendererX.new(root, {
                    minGridDistance: 20,
                    cellStartLocation: 0.2,
                    cellEndLocation: 0.8
                })
            })
        );

        // Create series
        function createSeries(name: string, field: string) {
            var series = chart.series.push(
                am5xy.LineSeries.new(root, {
                    name: name,
                    xAxis: xAxis,
                    yAxis: yAxis,
                    valueYField: field,
                    valueXField: "date",
                    tooltip: am5.Tooltip.new(root, {})
                })
            );

            series.strokes.template.setAll({
                strokeWidth: 2
            });

            series.events.on("datavalidated", function() {
                // @ts-ignore
                chart.get("cursor").setAll({
                    positionX: 0.99,
                    positionY: 0.4,
                    xAxis: xAxis,
                    yAxis: yAxis,
                    alwaysShow: true
                });
            });

            // @ts-ignore
            series.get("tooltip").label.set("text", "[bold]{name}[/]: {valueY}")
            series.data.setAll(data);
        }

        createSeries("ì„œìš¸", "value");
        createSeries("ê²½ê¸°", "value2");

        // Add cursor
        chart.set("cursor", am5xy.XYCursor.new(root, {
            behavior: "none",
            xAxis: xAxis,
        }));

        xAxis.set("tooltip", am5.Tooltip.new(root, {
            themeTags: ["axis"]
        }));

        yAxis.set("tooltip", am5.Tooltip.new(root, {
            themeTags: ["axis"]
        }));

        return () => {
            chart.dispose();
        };
    }, []);

    return(
        <div id={"chartdiv"} style={{width: "1000px", height: "500px"}}/>
    )
}

export default Chart;

4. ë§ˆì¹˜ë©°

  • Next.jsì—ì„œ amcharts5ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš© í•˜ëŠ” ë°©ë²•ê³¼ í™œìš© ë°©ë²•ì— ëŒ€í•´ ì•Œì•„ ë³´ì•˜ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

 const onSubmit = async () => {

ì•ˆë…•í•˜ì„¸ìš”!

ì´ë²ˆ í¬ìŠ¤íŒ… ì—ì„œëŠ” React.jsì—ì„œ íšŒì›ê°€ì… ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ êµ¬í˜„í•´ ë³´ê³  useCallback í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ ìœ íš¨ì„± ì²´í¬ í•˜ëŠ” ë°©ë²•ì— ëŒ€í•´ ì•Œì•„ë³´ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

1. ê°œìš”

íšŒì›ê°€ì… ì‹œ í•„ìš”í•œ ì´ë¦„, íœ´ëŒ€í°, ì´ë©”ì¼ì„ ë§Œë“¤ê³  ìœ íš¨ì„± ì²´í¬ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ êµ¬í˜„ í•´ ë³´ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

í•­ëª©ë³„ ì¡°ê±´

  • ì´ë¦„: í•„ìˆ˜ê°’, í•œê¸€ë§Œ ë“±ë¡ ê°€ëŠ¥, 1ê¸€ì ì´ìƒ 50ê¸€ì ì´í•˜ (í™ê¸¸ë™)

  • íšŒì› ê°€ì… ë™ì˜: í•„ìˆ˜ê°’, ì²´í¬ ì•ˆí•˜ë©´ ë“±ë¡ ì•ˆë¨

2. í™”ë©´ êµ¬í˜„

â›” ï¸styled-components ë¶€ë¶„ì€ ìƒëµ í•˜ì˜€ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

  1. ì´ë¦„ ê°’ì— ì…ë ¥ í•  ë•Œë§ˆë‹¤ onChangeName ê°€ ì‹¤í–‰ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

  3. ì´ë©”ì¼ì„ ì…ë ¥ í•  ë•Œë§ˆë‹¤ onChangeEmail í•¨ìˆ˜ê°€ ì‹¤í–‰ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
  4. íšŒì› ê°€ì… ë™ì˜ ì²´í¬ ë°•ìŠ¤ ì„ íƒ ì‹œ changeHandler ê°€ ì‹¤í–‰ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
return(
    <>
        <h1>íšŒì› ê°€ì…</h1>
        <Text type="text" name="name" onChange={onChangeName} placeholder={"*ì´ë¦„"}/>
        <Text type="number" name="phone" onChange={onChangePhone} placeholder={"*íœ´ëŒ€í°"}/>

        <input style={{display: 'inline-block'}} className={"input-txt"} type="checkbox" id="consentCheck" onChange={e => {changeHandler(e.currentTarget.checked, 'consentCheck')}}/>
        <p style={{display: 'inline-block'}}>íšŒì› ê°€ì… ë™ì˜</p>

3. êµ¬í˜„ ë°©ë²•

3-1. ì´ˆê¸° ë³€ìˆ˜ê°’ ì…‹íŒ…

  • ì´ë¦„, íœ´ëŒ€í°, ì´ë©”ì¼ì— ëŒ€í•œ ë³€ìˆ˜ ê°’ê³¼ ìœ íš¨ì„± ì²´í¬ì— ëŒ€í•œ ë³€ìˆ˜ ê°’ì„ useStateë¡œ ì„ ì–¸ í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
const [name, setName] = useState<string>('');       // ì´ë¦„
const [phone, setPhone] = useState<string>('');     // íœ´ëŒ€í°
const [email, setEmail] = useState<string>('');     // ì´ë©”ì¼

const [isName, setIsName] = useState<boolean>(false);       // ì´ë¦„ ìœ íš¨ì„± ì²´í¬ & ì‘ì„± ì—¬ë¶€ 
const [isKor, setIsKor] = useState<boolean>(false);         // í•œê¸€ ìœ íš¨ì„± ì²´í¬
const [isPhone, setIsPhone] = useState<boolean>(false);     // íœ´ëŒ€í° ìœ íš¨ì„± ì²´í¬ & ì‘ì„± ì—¬ë¶€
const [isEmail, setIsEmail] = useState<boolean>(false);     // ì´ë©”ì¼ ìœ íš¨ì„± ì²´í¬ & ì‘ì„± ì—¬ë¶€
const [isChecked, setIsChecked] = useState<boolean>(false);       // ë™ì˜ ì—¬ë¶€ ìœ íš¨ì„± ì²´í¬

3-2. ìœ íš¨ì„± ì²´í¬ í•¨ìˆ˜

  1. í•œê¸€ ì²´í¬
const checkKor = (str: string) => {
    const regExp = /[ã„±-ã…ã…-ã…£ê°€-í£]/g;
    return regExp.test(str);
}
  1. ì˜ë¬¸ ì²´í¬
const checkEng = (str: string) => {
    const regExp = /[a-zA-Z]/;
    return regExp.test(str);
}
  1. íŠ¹ìˆ˜ë¬¸ì ì²´í¬
const checkSpc = (str: string) => {
    const regExp = /[~!@#$%^&*()_+|<>?:{}]/;
    return regExp.test(str);
}

3-3. ë³€ìˆ˜ë³„ onChange í•¨ìˆ˜ (useCallback)

input ê°’ì— ê°’ì„ ì…ë ¥ í•  ë•Œë§ˆë‹¤ console ì— ê°’ì´ ì°íˆë„ë¡ ì¶”ê°€ í–ˆëŠ”ë°, ê°’ì´ ë³€í•  ë•Œ ë§ˆë‹¤ ì½˜ì†”ì— e.target.value ì´ ì°í˜€ì„œ ë³€ìˆ˜ ê°’ì„ ì…‹íŒ… í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

  1. ì´ë¦„ : onChangeName í•¨ìˆ˜ (setIsName, setIsKor, setNameì„ ì…‹íŒ… í•¨)

    • regex.test(e.target.value) ì´ true ì´ê³ , ì´ë¦„ ì…ë ¥ ê°’ lengthê°€ 0 ì¼ ê²½ìš° setIsNameëŠ” falseë¡œ ì…‹íŒ…
    • e.target.value ê°’ì´ í•œê¸€ì´ê³ , ì˜ì–´ê°€ ì•„ë‹ˆê³ , íŠ¹ìˆ˜ë¬¸ìê°€ ì•„ë‹ˆê³ , ì…ë ¥ ê°’ lengthê°€ 1 < value <= 50 ì¼ ê²½ìš° setIsKor, setIsName ë‘˜ ë‹¤ trueë¡œ ì…‹íŒ…
    • e.target.value ê°’ì´ í•œê¸€ì´ ì•„ë‹ˆê±°ë‚˜, ì˜ì–´ê±°ë‚˜, íŠ¹ìˆ˜ë¬¸ìê°€ ìˆê±°ë‚˜, ì…ë ¥ ê°’ lengthê°€ 1 < value <= 50 ì¼ ê²½ìš° setIsKorëŠ” false, setIsNameì€ trueë¡œ ì…‹íŒ…
    • e.target.value ê°’ì´ í•œê¸€ ì´ê³ , ì…ë ¥ ê°’ lengthê°€ 1 < value <= 50 ì¼ ê²½ìš° setNameì— ì…ë ¥ ê°’ ì…‹íŒ…, setIsNameì€ trueë¡œ ì…‹íŒ… / ì•„ë‹ˆë©´ setIsNameëŠ” falseë¡œ ì…‹íŒ…
const onChangeName = useCallback((e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
   if(e.target.value.length === 0){
     setIsName(false);
   }
   
   if(checkKor(e.target.value) && !checkEng(e.target.value) && !checkSpc(e.target.value) && (e.target.value.length > 1 && e.target.value.length <= 50)){
     setIsKor(true);
     setIsName(true);
   }
   
   if(!checkKor(e.target.value) || checkEng(e.target.value) || checkSpc(e.target.value) && (e.target.value.length > 1 && e.target.value.length <= 50)){
     setIsKor(false);
     setIsName(true);
   }
   
   if(checkKor(e.target.value) && (e.target.value.length > 1 && e.target.value.length <= 50)){
     setName(e.target.value);
     setIsName(true);
   } else if(e.target.value.length <= 1 && e.target.value.length > 50 || e.target.value.length === 0){
     setIsName(false);
   }
}, [])

  1. íœ´ëŒ€í° : onChangePhone í•¨ìˆ˜ (setPhone, setIsPhoneì„ ì…‹íŒ… í•¨)

    • regex.test(e.target.value) ì´ true ì´ê³ , íœ´ëŒ€í° ì…ë ¥ ê°’ lengthê°€ 10 ì´ë‚˜ 11ì¼ ê²½ìš° setPhoneì— ê°’ì„ ë„£ê³ , setIsPhoneëŠ” trueë¡œ ì…‹íŒ… / ì•„ë‹ˆë©´ setIsPhoneëŠ” falseë¡œ ì…‹íŒ…
const onChangePhone = useCallback((e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
   const regex = /^01([0|1|6|7|8|9])-?([0-9]{3,4})-?([0-9]{4})$/;
   
   if (regex.test(e.target.value) && e.target.value.length === 10 || e.target.value.length === 11) {
     setPhone(e.target.value);
     setIsPhone(true);
   } else {
     setIsPhone(false);
   }
}, [])

  1. ì´ë©”ì¼ : onChangeEmail í•¨ìˆ˜ (setEmail, setIsEmailì„ ì…‹íŒ… í•¨)

const onChangeEmail = useCallback((e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
   const regex = /^[0-9a-zA-Z]([-_\.]?[0-9a-zA-Z])*@[0-9a-zA-Z]([-_\.]?[0-9a-zA-Z])*\.[a-zA-Z]{2,3}$/i;
   
   if (regex.test(e.target.value)) {

}, [])

  1. ì²´í¬ë°•ìŠ¤ : changeHandler í•¨ìˆ˜ (setIsCheckedì„ ì…‹íŒ… í•¨)

const changeHandler = (checked: boolean, id: string) => {
    if (checked && id === "check") {
        setIsChecked(true);
    } else if (!checked && id === "check") {
        setIsChecked(false);
    }
}

4. ì „ì²´ ì½”ë“œ

  • ê°€ì…í•˜ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼ì„ ëˆ„ë¥´ë©´ onSubmit í•¨ìˆ˜ê°€ ì‹¤í–‰ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
  • formDataì— ì´ë¦„, íœ´ëŒ€í°, ì´ë©”ì¼ ì •ë³´ë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ê³  ìœ íš¨ì„± ì²´í¬ê°€ ì™„ë£Œ ë˜ë©´
    post í•¨ìˆ˜ë¡œ APIì— ê°’ì„ ì „ë‹¬í•˜ê³ , /submit ë§í¬ë¡œ ì´ë™í•˜ê²Œ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
const index = () => {
   const [name, setName] = useState<string>('');
   const [phone, setPhone] = useState<string>('');
   const [email, setEmail] = useState<string>('');
   
   const [isName, setIsName] = useState<boolean>(false);
   const [isKor, setIsKor] = useState<boolean>(false);
   const [isPhone, setIsPhone] = useState<boolean>(false);
   const [isEmail, setIsEmail] = useState<boolean>(false);
   const [isChecked, setIsChecked] = useState<boolean>(false);

    const checkKor = (str: string) => {
        const regExp = /[ã„±-ã…ã…-ã…£ê°€-í£]/g;
        return regExp.test(str);
    }

    const checkEng = (str: string) => {
        const regExp = /[a-zA-Z]/;
        return regExp.test(str);
    }

    const checkSpc = (str: string) => {
        const regExp = /[~!@#$%^&*()_+|<>?:{}]/;
        return regExp.test(str);
    }

    const onChangeName = useCallback((e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
        if(e.target.value.length === 0){
            setIsName(false);
        }

        if(checkKor(e.target.value) && !checkEng(e.target.value) && !checkSpc(e.target.value) && (e.target.value.length > 1 && e.target.value.length <= 50)){
            setIsKor(true);
            setIsName(true);
        }

        if(!checkKor(e.target.value) || checkEng(e.target.value) || checkSpc(e.target.value) && (e.target.value.length > 1 && e.target.value.length <= 50)){
            setIsKor(false);
            setIsName(true);
        }

        if(checkKor(e.target.value) && (e.target.value.length > 1 && e.target.value.length <= 50)){
            setName(e.target.value);
            setIsName(true);
        } else if(e.target.value.length <= 1 && e.target.value.length > 50 || e.target.value.length === 0){
            setIsName(false);
        }
    }, [])

    const onChangePhone = useCallback((e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
        const regex = /^01([0|1|6|7|8|9])-?([0-9]{3,4})-?([0-9]{4})$/;

        if (regex.test(e.target.value) && e.target.value.length === 10 || e.target.value.length === 11) {
            setPhone(e.target.value);
            setIsPhone(true);
        } else {
            setIsPhone(false);
        }
    }, [])

    const onChangeEmail = useCallback((e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
        const regex = /^[0-9a-zA-Z]([-_\.]?[0-9a-zA-Z])*@[0-9a-zA-Z]([-_\.]?[0-9a-zA-Z])*\.[a-zA-Z]{2,3}$/i;

        if (regex.test(e.target.value)) {
            setEmail(e.target.value);
            setIsEmail(true);
        } else {
            setEmail(e.target.value);
            setIsEmail(false);
        }
    }, [])

    const onSubmit = async () => {
        const formData = new FormData();
        formData.append('name', name);
        formData.append('phone', phone);
        formData.append('email', email);

        const config = {
            headers: {
                "content-type": "multipart/form-data",
            },
        };

        if(!isName) return alert("ì´ë¦„ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”.");
        if(!isKor) return alert("ì´ë¦„ì„ í•œê¸€ë¡œ ì…ë ¥í•´ ì£¼ì„¸ìš”.");
        if(!isPhone) return alert("íœ´ëŒ€í° ë²ˆí˜¸ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”.");
        if(email.length > 0 && !isEmail){
            return alert("ì´ë©”ì¼ ì–‘ì‹ì— ë§ê²Œ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”.");
        }
        if(!isChecked) return alert("íšŒì› ê°€ì… ë™ì˜ ì—¬ë¶€ì— ë™ì˜í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”.");

        if(isName && isPhone && isChecked){
            try {
                await axios
                    .post(API_URL, formData, config)
                    .then((res) => {
                        if (res.data.result === "success") {
                            location.href = "/submit";
                        }
                    })
            } catch (err) {
                console.error(err)
            }
        }
    }

    const changeHandler = (checked: boolean, id: string) => {
        if (checked && id === "check") {
            setIsChecked(true);
        } else if (!checked && id === "check") {
            setIsChecked(false);
        }
    }

    return(
        <>
            <h1>íšŒì› ê°€ì…</h1>
            <Text type="text" name="name" onChange={onChangeName} placeholder={"*ì´ë¦„"}/>
            <Text type="number" name="phone" onChange={onChangePhone} placeholder={"*íœ´ëŒ€í°"}/>
            <Text type="text" name="email" onChange={onChangeEmail} placeholder={"ì´ë©”ì¼"}/>
            <input style={{display: 'inline-block'}} className={"input-txt"} type="checkbox" id="check" onChange={e => {changeHandler(e.currentTarget.checked, 'check')}}/>
            <p style={{display: 'inline-block'}}>íšŒì› ê°€ì… ë™ì˜</p>
            <Submit onClick={() => onSubmit()}>
                <SubmitText>ê°€ì…í•˜ê¸°</SubmitText>
            </Submit>
        </>
    )
}

export default index;

import InfiniteScroll from "react-infinite-scroll-component";
import {useEffect, useState} from "react";
import axios from "axios";

const style = {
    height: 40, border: "1px solid green", margin: 10, padding: 8
};

const test = () => {
    const [pageNum, setPageNum] = useState(1);
    const [data, setData] = useState('');

    const getMovieList = async (pageNum: number) => {
        await axios
            .get(`https://yts.mx/api/v2/list_movies.json?page=${pageNum}`)
            .then((res) => {
                data === '' ? setData(res.data.data.movies) : setData(data.concat(res.data.data.movies));
            });
    }

    useEffect( () => {
        getMovieList(pageNum);
    }, []);

    const fetchMoreData = () => {
        setPageNum (pageNum +1);
        getMovieList(pageNum+1);
    }

    if(data === '' || data === undefined) return <>loading...</>;

    console.log("Data==>", data);

    return(
        <div>
            <h1>Movie: react-infinite-scroll-component</h1>
            <hr />
            <div id="scrollableDiv" style={{ height: 600, overflow: "auto" }}>
                <InfiniteScroll
                    dataLength={data.length}
                    next={fetchMoreData}
                    hasMore={true}

                    // next={type === "movie" ? fetchMoreData : () => {}}
                    // hasMore={type === "movie"}

                    loader={<h4>Loading...</h4>}
                    scrollableTarget="scrollableDiv"
                >
                    {data.map((i: any, index: number) => (
                        <div style={style} key={index}>
                            ìˆœì„œ: {index+1} ì˜í™” ì œëª©: {data[index].title}
                        </div>
                    ))}
                </InfiniteScroll>
            </div>
        </div>
    )
}

export default test;

import ReactPlayer from 'react-player/lazy';
import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react";

type VideoPlayerProps = {
    title: string;
    vodPlaylistId: string;
}

const VideoPlayer = ({title, vodPlaylistId}: VideoPlayerProps) => {
    const [playIndex, setPlayIndex] = useState(0);
    const playList = [
        {index:1, url: 'https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/BigBuckBunny.mp4'},
        {index:2, url: 'http://sample.vodobox.net/skate_phantom_flex_4k/skate_phantom_flex_4k.m3u8'},
        {index:3, url: 'http://playertest.longtailvideo.com/adaptive/wowzaid3/playlist.m3u8'}
    ];

    const handleNextVideo = (video: string | any[], playIndex: number) => {
        if(playIndex === video.length - 1){
            setPlayIndex(0);
        }else{
            setPlayIndex(playIndex + 1);
        }
    }

    const selectVideo = (index: number) => {
        setPlayIndex(index);
    }

    if(playList === null) return <p>Loading...</p>;

    return (
        <>
            <h2>Player Test</h2>
            <ReactPlayer
                url={playList[playIndex].url}
                playing
                controls
                muted
                progressInterval={1000}
                pip={true}
                onEnded={() => {handleNextVideo(playList, playIndex)}}
                width={'800px'}
                height={'500px'}
            />
        </>
    )
}

export default VideoPlayer;

function solution(s) {
    let answer ='';
    let mok = s.length/2;
    mok = parseInt(mok.toString());

     if(s.length % 2 === 0){
         answer += s[mok-1] + s[mok];
     }else{
         answer += s[mok];
     }
     return answer;
}

function solution(numbers) {
    let answer = '';

    let numberSort = numbers.sort();
    let reverseNumber = numberSort.reverse();

    for(let i in reverseNumber){
        answer += reverseNumber[i];
    }

    if(answer[0] === "0"){
        answer = "0";
    }

    return answer.toString();
}

  • ì½”ë“œ ì•ˆì—ì„œ arr.sort([compareFunction])ì˜ í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•œ ê²ƒì„ ë³¼ ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ”ë°ìš”. compareFunctionì´ë€, ì •ë ¬ ìˆœì„œë¥¼ ì •ì˜í•˜ëŠ” í•¨ìˆ˜. ìƒëµí•˜ë©´ ë°°ì—´ì€ ê° ìš”ì†Œì˜ ë¬¸ìì—´ ë³€í™˜ì— ë”°ë¼ ê° ë¬¸ìì˜ ìœ ë‹ˆ ì½”ë“œ ì½”ë“œ í¬ì¸íŠ¸ ê°’ì— ë”°ë¼ ì •ë ¬ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

    • compareFunction(a, b)ì´ 0ë³´ë‹¤ ì‘ì€ ê²½ìš° aë¥¼ bë³´ë‹¤ ë‚®ì€ ìƒ‰ì¸ìœ¼ë¡œ ì •ë ¬í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì¦‰, aê°€ ë¨¼ì €ì˜µë‹ˆë‹¤.
    • compareFunction(a, b)ì´ 0ì„ ë°˜í™˜í•˜ë©´ aì™€ bë¥¼ ì„œë¡œì— ëŒ€í•´ ë³€ê²½í•˜ì§€ ì•Šê³  ëª¨ë“  ë‹¤ë¥¸ ìš”ì†Œì— ëŒ€í•´ ì •ë ¬í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
    • compareFunction(a, b)ì´ 0ë³´ë‹¤ í° ê²½ìš°, bë¥¼ aë³´ë‹¤ ë‚®ì€ ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ë¡œ ì†ŒíŠ¸í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
    • compareFunction(a, b)ì€ ìš”ì†Œ aì™€ bì˜ íŠ¹ì • ìŒì´ ë‘ ê°œì˜ ì¸ìˆ˜ë¡œ ì£¼ì–´ì§ˆ ë•Œ í•­ìƒ ë™ì¼í•œ ê°’ì„ ë°˜í™˜í•´ì•¼í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì¼ì¹˜í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ” ê²°ê³¼ê°€ ë°˜í™˜ë˜ë©´ ì •ë ¬ ìˆœì„œëŠ” ì •ì˜ë˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.
  • ë”°ë¼ì„œ ì•„ë˜ì˜ ì½”ë“œë¡œ ì‹¤í–‰í•˜ê²Œ ë˜ë©´ compareFunction í•¨ìˆ˜ì— ì˜í•´ì„œ 12121ë¼ëŠ” ì •ë‹µì„ ì–»ì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆê²Œ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
function solution(numbers) {
    var answer = numbers.sort((a,b) => (b.toString() + a.toString())-(a.toString() + b.toString())).join('');

    if(answer[0] === "0"){
        answer = "0";
    }

    return answer;
}

3. ë‹¤ë¥¸ ì‚¬ëŒì˜ í’€ì´

function solution(numbers) {
    var answer = numbers.map(v=>v+'')
                        .sort((a,b) => (b+a)*1 - (a+b)*1)
                        .join('');

function solution(clothes) {
    let answer = 1;
    let map = new Map();

    let size = clothes.length;
    for (let i = 0; i < size; i++) {
        if (!map.has(clothes[i][1])){
            map.set(clothes[i][1], 1);
        }else{
            map.set(clothes[i][1], map.get(clothes[i][1]) + 1);
        }
    }

    for (let value of map.values())
        answer *= value + 1;

    return answer - 1;
}
